SEARCH
Module HospitalManagementSystem
Package entities

Class User

java.lang.Object
entities.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Patient, Staff
public abstract class User extends Object
Represents a generic user in the hospital management system. This abstract class serves as the base class for all user types.

      public User(String userID, String userName, String userPass, boolean firstLogin, String gender)

      userName - The name of the user.
      userPass - The password for the user.

      gender - The gender of the user.

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(String userPass)
      Validates the user's password.
      Parameters:
      userPass - The password to validate.
      Returns:
      `true` if the provided password matches the user's password; `false` otherwise.

    • isFirstLogin

      public boolean isFirstLogin()
      Checks if this is the user's first login.
      Returns:
      `true` if this is the user's first login; `false` otherwise.
